template.name: Best Helpdesk Management System - Improve Support & Enhance Customer Satisfaction

div.p: Our Helpdesk Management System streamlines support operations and simplifies ticket resolution for businesses of all sizes.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-12

img.title: Best Helpdesk Management System - Improve Support & Enhance Customer Satisfaction
Best Helpdesk Management System - Improve Support & Enhance Customer Satisfaction

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-12

div.p: This app provides a flexible and customizable helpdesk for Service Desk, Technical Support Team, and Issue Ticket System. Support tickets are sent by email to customers and admins, and customers can view their tickets from the website portal. The desk is customizable, clean, and flexible.
Advanced help desk features for real-time customer support challenges.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Helpdesk ticket timesheets can be used to track work done and time spent on specific tickets.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Multiple users can be assigned to a ticket, which will be notified by email.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: You can assign multiple portal users to tickets, which will be notified by email.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: You can manage products in tickets and display them in the ticket PDF report.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: This app allows helpdesk teams to generate opportunities from leads/opportunities directly from helpdesk tickets.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Manager, Team Leader and user can use a dynamic dashboard to control data visibility without creating separate dashboards.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: The helpdesk portal allows customers to create tickets, chat with the help desk, and assign teams easily.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Here in the helpdesk, we build a beautiful portal for only portal users and customers.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Dynamic dashboards allow users to access data they have access to.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: The helpdesk allows users to define stages based on their needs.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: The helpdesk portal allows users to manage tickets with assigned users and their status.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Helpdesk ticket alarms can be set to remind users to complete tasks.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Helpdesk SLA creates trust between the customer and the provider by clearly defining what needs to be done.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Whatsapp has become a popular platform for communication, leading to increased use.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: This app allows helpdesk teams to generate tasks from helpdesk tickets, allowing them to manage tasks.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: Inbound mails can be used to create tickets in the helpdesk.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

svg.title: Email Alias For Dyanamic Team Assign

div.h4: Email Alias For Dynamic Team Assign
div.p: This app has added features such as email aliases for dynamic team assign.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: You can quickly assign people, stages, multi-users, and followers to multiple tickets.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: The app allows helpdesk teams to generate invoices from helpdesk tickets, and vice versa from invoices.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: This app allows helpdesk teams to generate purchase orders directly from helpdesk tickets, or vice versa from RFQ/PO.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: The app allows helpdesk teams to generate sales orders from helpdesk tickets, and vice versa from quotation/sale orders.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box sh_mb_1

div.p: You can merge your tickets with many options!

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box sh_mb_1 sh_mb_0

div.p: Your responsibility is to update the customer's ticket when working on it.
Experience efficient customer support with our smart help desk features.

svg.title: Auto Change Ticket Stage On Replied

div.h5: Auto Change Ticket Stage On Replied

svg.title: Auto Change Ticket Status On Replied

div.h5: Auto Change Ticket Status On Replied

col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-6 col-md-6 sh_main_work_box mb-xl-0 sh_mb_1
col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-6 col-md-6 sh_main_work_box sh_mb_1 sh_mb_0

div.h2:
Delivering Top-Notch Support
and Highly Effective Solutions.
